name: RespiratorySupportProceduresRelatedToCOVID19
title: Respiratory Support Procedures Related to COVID 19
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to group concepts of respiratory support procedures that when present with a confirmed COVID-19 diagnoses are indicative of a COVID-19 complication.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that identify respiratory support procedures that are possibly performed with confirmed COVID-19 cases.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

contains.display: Extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (procedure)
Assisted breathing (regime/therapy)
